func1.desc1: Enter the settings page you want to submit to the agent by clicking on the settings icon in the upper right corner of the chat window.
func1.desc2: Click on the 'Submit to Agent Market' button in the upper right corner.
func1.title: Submit via {{appName}}

func2.desc: If you want to add the agent to the index, create an entry in the skills directory using agent-template.json or agent-template-full.json, write a brief description and appropriate tags, and then create a pull request.
func2.title: Submit via Github
